alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 20 at 1:36PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A line of thunderstorms will impact portions of western Weber... southeastern Box Elder...Salt Lake...Davis...northwestern Utah and northeastern Tooele Counties through 215 PM MDT... At 135 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Corinne to 6 miles northwest of Magna. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, West Valley City, Sandy, Ogden, Layton, Murray, Bountiful, Tooele, Farmington, Brigham City, Hill Air Force Base, West Jordan, Taylorsville, South Jordan, Lehi, Draper, Riverton, Roy, Cottonwood Heights and Clearfield. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 284 and 364. Interstate 84 between mile markers 82 and 88. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 91 and 127. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80
